Class Settlement

  • java.lang.Object
    • lord.of.rome.DrawableObject
      • lord.of.rome.Place
        • lord.of.rome.Settlement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Capital

    public class Settlement
extends Place
    Class which simulates concept of roman empire settlement.
    Author:
    Carlos
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
